statements: DELETE FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE trajectory_name = 'Orbital Trajectory';
DELETE FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND trajectory_type = 'Geostationary' AND satellite_id = 5;
DELETE FROM trajectory_data WHERE data_id > 100 AND velocity < 500;
DELETE FROM trajectory_data WHERE data_id = 100 AND satellite_id = 10;
DELETE FROM satellites WHERE launch_date < '2022-01-01' AND trajectory_pattern = 'polar';
DELETE FROM trajectory_data WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
DELETE FROM Trajectory WHERE satellite_id = 3 AND trajectory_location = 'Space Station';
